Name: Heavy Armored Assassin
About the game: This is a military-themed single-player shooting game produced by individual developers. In the game, you will play the role of a commander, drive a tank and command your companions, search for and assassinate the enemy's field commander in the wilderness. Forming A Team As a commander, you can configure your armored units in the garage Charging You need drive the currently selected equipment with the keyboard and mouse. As a commander, you can give orders to your partner vehicle, mark the march or fire the target Covert Assassination The battlefield is full of enemy scouts, don't be spotted by them, otherwise more armored troops will come to support. Long-distance covert assassination is a good option Calculate Shooting Elements, Strike Beyond Visual Range A good commander will reasonably allocate the roles of the convoy Use light vehicles to conduct stealth reconnaissance in enemy-occupied areas, and mark the enemy's core targets Set shooting parameters for your cannon‘s accurately assassinate, then give a 155mm gift to the invader Be Careful The enemy is ambushing some key roads by surprise, so be careful！ Terminate The Invader Breakthrough the enemy armored force line, search and destroy the command post of the invaders！！
